Articles.Content:
THE GREAT KERBAL WAR:

This is the story of when a war started between Rebels and the Government of kerbin. The war Would start when the rebels demanded full control of the government. when president Kerbama says no, the rebels get infuriated and declare war, sending kerbin into total chaos. The rebels were winning the war after several months of stalemate. The government saw that these rebels had better tactics and foot soldiers to compensate for fewer numbers. the government turned to KSC to help win this war. they would help develop long rage and volatile weapons to aid the government. in turn the rebels began attacks on the space center itself. no one is safe anymore.

Scenario one: destroying the small rebel camp near the insular airfield.

The men at KSC found a rebel camp near the airfield.

when we decided to blow them to smithereens, bob said it was too risky because they might damage the airfield.

The scientists decided on a small explosive missile at the center of camp.

the scientists sent in a submersible rover to find the exact coordinates of the base and report back.

the sub is ready for deployment and jebediah is ready for this job.

once jeb spotted the camp he radioed in immediately.

jebs scout mission is done.

the firing of the missiles shall happen next.

the missiles were armed with a cluster explosive each.

they were launched and with devastation.

The camp is gone. the first mission is over.

MISSION 2: INVESTIGATE ACCIDENT.

Aeris 3A flight 371 crashed into Kerbal X flight 86.

The Kerbal responsible is unknown but it is believed that Jonden kerman crashed it on purpose.

Jebediah has been tasked with finding out why jonden crashed the ship.

Edited March 27, 2014 by Dark Junior

The First suspect is Seemal kerman, Jonden's best friend at KSC.

Jeb asks for a meeting with seemal:

Jeb:Seemal, do you Know what happened to jonden?

Seemal:*sob* he was a very good person. he was always ready to stand up for what he believed and believed in the safety of all kerbonauts.

Jeb: it would seem impossible he would endanger several kerbals.

Seemal: I cannot believe he would do it with his own free will.

Jeb: perhaps the mechjeb autopilot accidentaly kicked in.

Seemal: or maybe it was no accident.

Jeb: perhaps the Mechjeb was tampered with.

Seemal: the rebels may be responsible for it?

Jeb: we are finding the ship's black box and mechjeb module in the debris.

Seemal: oh thank You!

Jeb: You're welcome.

The Black box was found and examined. the mechjeb was working perfectly. The ship was purposefully piloted and Crashed.

The next idea was that the ship was hijacked and taken over. the next day a body was found. it was jonden's.

The body was stabbed several times through the vital organs.

It was believed the ship was hijacked and Jonden was stabbed.

Edited March 29, 2014 by Dark Junior

It is unknown who hijacked it but the prime suspect is Sengar Kerman. He loaded the ship's fuel and disappeared after fueling the ship.

The KSC will gather more info over time.

Case closed.

Edited March 29, 2014 by Dark Junior
Fix your spelling and grammar. This hurts to read. This gets a writing tag.

OK PORRY i will

by the way i type fast
OOH! Can't wait for more!
thanks! I love the support!

MISSION 3: FIND BOB KERMAN

Bob Kerman was recently kidnapped. The rebels are believed to be the ones guilty of this crime.

several scout ships were dispatched to find bob. a rebel camp was found eventually.

this is believed to be the camp bob is held at. it is near the Space center and is pretty big.

jeb and a small task force will take a modified 5 kerbal albatross 3 to rescue bob.
the albatross 3 recieved a similar fate and crashed into a space center building. only jeb survived.

Jeb always survives.

Keep up the good work!

sorry will post again soon

been busy.

part 3 continued.

after the albatross incident a different ship was sent. it was commandend by bob kerman.

it landed near the base well. it landed so close it almost hit the base. descott and joremone, the combat specialists, took out the guards. bob climbed up the ladder and took out that guard protecting him.

they escaped. the engine sustained damage because it hit the bas on the ascent. it crashes near the space center

bob is returned safely.

Edited April 24, 2014 by Dark Junior
you do know that It was to find bob kerman but bob kerman piloted the plane, wut?

sorry meant to do bill kerman in plane. mixup

- - - Updated - - -

part 3 continued.

after the albatross incident a different ship was sent. it was commandend by bob kerman.

it landed near the base well. it landed so close it almost hit the base. descott and joremone, the combat specialists, took out the guards. bob climbed up the ladder and took out that guard protecting him.

they escaped. the engine sustained damage because it hit the base on the ascent. it crashes near the space center

bob is returned safely.
please give me suggestions and comments! i would love to hear from people!

MISSION 4: save jeb,bill and bob

jeb, bill and bob are on a routine orbital flight to test a new design.

while they are checking systems, an unidentified object appeared.

jeb: unidentified spacecraft, identify yourself

the craft stayed silent

jeb: unidentified spacecraft, respond!

still silent

jeb: IDENTIFY NOW!

still nothing

I Am Back!

before the update i deleted the world by accident. i never made a new one after. this is a fresh world. the 4th mission will be remade. another reason its been so long is i just got star wars: the old republic

the next mission will be VERY SOON. be patient
